sentences.english: Japanese Army 16th Division Infantry troops climb up the walls near Zhongshan Gate.
sentences.chinese: 日军第十六师团步兵攀上中山门。

sentences.english: History will inspire people Kwok-hing and scale new heights.
sentences.chinese: 辉煌的历史将激励和兴人再攀高峰。

sentences.english: In humid conditions , it can survive on land for several days.
sentences.chinese: 在潮湿的环境中，攀鲈可于陆地上存活数天。

sentences.english: The title hopes to go upward, the wall signs thousand Rens, and the jade pillar apex Yao can not climb.
sentences.chinese: 抬头向上望去，壁立千仞，玉柱峰顶遥不可攀。

sentences.english: An old ivy vine climbed halfway up the brick wall.
sentences.chinese: 一棵老极了的长春藤攀在砖墙的半腰上。

sentences.english: She still needs to prove herself before she can get with this wall-crawler.
sentences.chinese: 她在和攀墙者走到一起之前还需要证明她自己。

sentences.english: Trad, Alpine and Sport climbing all require different harness setups.
sentences.chinese: 传统攀，阿尔卑斯，运动攀都要求不同类型的安全带。

sentences.english: Trad, Alpine and Sport climbing all require different harness setups.
sentences.chinese: 传统攀，阿尔卑斯，运动攀都要求不同类型的安全带。

sentences.english: This is out and away the best apple pie I've tasted for years.
sentences.chinese: 这是几年来我吃到过的最好的苹果攀。

sentences.english: Goats climb argan trees in order to eat their black olive-like fruits.
sentences.chinese: 山羊攀上树枝是为了吃树上象橄榄一样的黑色果实。

sentences.english: He kept his hand on the rail as he climbed the steps.
sentences.chinese: 他攀上台阶时，手不离扶栏。

sentences.english: When she's ready, tell her to reach out for that second bar.
sentences.chinese: 当她准备好了，让她去抓第二根攀吊架上的条。

sentences.english: We slowly muscled up the cliff.
sentences.chinese: 我们慢慢地用力攀上悬崖。

sentences.english: And about to climb, Tan Hua explained.
Only the most determined make the final journey up valley to the farthest extremity of the river.
sentences.chinese: 只有最虔诚的朝圣者才会攀抵恒河末端最远处的山谷。

sentences.english: After that, spam Scorpions and change to Avatars and Stealth Tanks when teched up.
sentences.chinese: 在这之后，暴蝎子并在攀科技后转型到圣灵与隐坦。
